    • Method Detail

      • productDetailPageCall

        default play.mvc.Call productDetailPageCall(java.lang.String productIdentifier,
                                            java.lang.String productVariantIdentifier)
        Returns the call to access the product detail page of the product and variant with the given identifiers.
        Parameters:
        productIdentifier - identifies the product that we want to access via the page call
        productVariantIdentifier - identifies the particular variant of the product that we want to access via the page call
        Returns:
        the page call to access the product detail page of this product

      • productOverviewPageCall

        default play.mvc.Call productOverviewPageCall(java.lang.String categoryIdentifier)
        Returns the call to access the product overview page for the products belonging to the category with the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        categoryIdentifier - identifies the category to which the products that we want to access via the page call belong
        Returns:
        the page call to access the product overview page of the products belonging to the given category.

      • searchProcessCall

        default play.mvc.Call searchProcessCall()
        Returns the call to process the product search.
        Returns:
        the process call for the search

        Finds the call to access the product detail page of the product contained in the given line item.

        Returns:
